sentences.sentence: Each has a snug mezzanine area and an antler-fenced balcony about eight metres above ground.
sentences.translation: 每个房间都有一个舒适的夹层区域和一个离地约八米的鹿角围栏阳台。

sentences.sentence: He came from the twenty-third floor down to the lobby on the mezzanine to collect his mail before breakfast, and he believed—he hoped—that he looked passably well: doing all right.
sentences.translation: 早饭前，他从二十三楼走到夹层的门厅去取邮件。他相信——他希望——他看上去还过得去：一切都很好。

sentences.sentence: Or you have to attend the fashion show at the shopping center atrium and throw strawberry gelatin from the mezzanine.
sentences.translation: 或者你得去购物中心往时装走秀的模特身上扔草莓布丁。
